tool.name: tool_25

param.name: SHAPESLIST
param.dialogReference:
Shapes List

Shapes list, input

The input shapes list.

param.name: SHAPES
param.dialogReference:
Shapes

Shapes, output, optional

optional

The shapefile picked from the shapes list.

param.name: INDEX
param.dialogReference:
Index

Integer

Minimum: 0

Default: 0

The list index of the shapefile to pick. Indices start at zero.

tool.summary: Main use of this tool is to support tool chain development, allowing to pick a single shapefile from a shapes list.
